alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 19 at 10:31AM MDT until May 20 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MDT /5 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT /8 AM PDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches below 5000 feet. 2 to 4 inches above 5000 feet with up to 10 inches in the higher terrain. * WHERE...Dixie, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, and Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 6 PM MDT /5 PM PDT/ this evening to 9 AM MDT /8 AM PDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
